item.title: [317][DELTA] ::xteletome [DELTA][317]
item.dc:creator: @iskatefallens iskatefallens
item.description:
@iskatefallens wrote:

What this command does is teleports a player to you.

[code] if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
					if(p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("%%%%")) {
						sM("No it's k");
						return;
					}	
		if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {
                    p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been teleported to " + playerName);
		}
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
            }
        }[/code]

Now Lemme Break It Down For You (:

   if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights >= 2) {                     <---- [b]"playerRights >= 2"  Put what your right is[/b]
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(10);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                                                 if(p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("%%%%")) {            <---- [b]"%%%%" Your name if you dont want to be teleported[/b]
                 sM("No it's k");
                 return;
              }   
     if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {                                 <---- [b]Wont telle them to you if there in fight cave[/b]s
                    p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM("You have been teleported to " + playerName);               <---- [b]You can change the sM to anything you like[/b]
     }
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist.");                              <---- [b]Player must be in "charachters" folder[/b]
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");    <---- RETRY lol
            }

[center]i know this is more a an explained snippet but i hope this helps some of you xP[/center]

If your using allstar or something change the "sM" to "sendMessage"
